nodes.name: Programming Principles II
nodes.description: Intermediate course teaching object-oriented programming with Java

nodes.name: Programming Principles I
nodes.description: Foundational programming course covering basic programming concepts

nodes.name: Object-Oriented Programming
nodes.description: Programming paradigm based on objects and classes

nodes.name: Java Programming Language
nodes.description: Object-oriented programming language used in CSCD211

nodes.name: Encapsulation
nodes.description: OOP principle of bundling data and methods together

nodes.name: Inheritance
nodes.description: OOP mechanism for creating new classes based on existing classes

nodes.name: Software Testing
nodes.description: Process of verifying that software behaves correctly

links.description: CSCD210 is required before taking CSCD211
OOP is a core component of CSCD211
Java is the implementation language for CSCD211
Testing is taught as part of CSCD211
